message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $130.  I think that's a fair price considering the quality of the product.
I understand that the product is of good quality, but I'm still not comfortable with $130. I'm willing to pay $115 for it.
